# Registration

## Registration Fees

**Note:** Registration fees are **inclusive of all taxes**.

### Indian Participants

| Category                           | Early Bird (INR) | Regular (INR) |
|:-----------------------------------|:----------------:|:-------------:|
| **Industry Personnel / Scientist** |     ₹10,000      |    ₹11,500    |
| **Faculties & Post Docs**          |      ₹8,000      |    ₹9,500     |
| **Students and Scholars**          |      ₹4,000      |    ₹5,000     |
| **Accompanying Person**            |      ₹1,500      |    ₹1,500     |

### Foreign Participants

| Category                           | Early Bird (USD) | Regular (USD) |
|:-----------------------------------|:----------------:|:-------------:|
| **Industry Personnel / Scientist** |      \$300       |     \$350     |
| **Faculties & Post Docs**          |      \$250       |     \$300     |
| **Students and Scholars**          |      \$150       |     \$200     |
| **Accompanying Person**            |       \$50       |     \$50      |
